text: Eric Balemans (17 November 1961 â€“ 2 July 2021) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy. He was a member of the House of Representatives between 1998 and 2006. Balemans died in Utrecht on 2 July 2021, aged 59. == References == Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:People's Party for Freedom and Democracy politicians
title: Eric Balemans
